Nickelodeon Resort Riviera Maya Gourmet Inclusive by Karisma

Level Up Your Family Vacation

Join SpongeBob SquarePants, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and many more Nickelodeon friends for a one-of-a-kind getaway. At Nickelodeon Hotels & Resorts Riviera Maya, youâ€™ll discover signature entertainment, fun-soaked days at Aqua NickÂ® waterpark, themed experiences, and beyond. Uniquely designed as a premium vacation experience with a playful Nickelodeon twist, itâ€™s the ultimate family beach escape for toddlers, tweens, and everyone in between.

All Play. All Day. All Included.

At Nickelodeon Hotels & Resorts Riviera Maya, our Karisma Gourmet InclusiveÂ® experience means guests of all ages get the five-star treatment they deserve. Enjoy gourmet eats at more than ten restaurants, premium drinks, personalized concierge service, access to our six-acre waterpark Aqua NickÂ®, the chance to meet iconic Nickelodeon characters, and so much more â€” all included in your stay!

Swim-Up Oceanfront Pool Deck Level Queen Suite

The Swim-Up Oceanfront Pool Deck Level Queen Suite features two Queen-size beds. The living area is furnished with a sofa bed, 2 Smart TVs, 2 bathrooms and table with chairs. The balcony features a seating area with a table and couch, perfect for lazy days or stargazing at night. Guests have the convenience of direct access to the main pool right from their spacious balcony with sitting area

Big Kahuna Suite

For the true connoisseur, this sophisticated suite pays tribute to the history of Nickelodeon animation. Every detail is lovingly curated to delight the lifelong fan from curated art pieces of beloved shows to furnishings inspired by Nickelodeonâ€™s iconic colors and characters.

Lair Suite

The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtlesâ€™ subterranean lair has never felt cooler or more luxurious! With nods to all the different versions of the Turtles through the years, this suite is the perfect place for a super fan to unwind or throw a private pizza party.

Penthouse Swim-Up Oceanfront Connecting Suite

Take the whole family to the top! This penthouse-level suite is connected to a Penthouse Swim-Up Oceanfront Queen Suite and features a private infinity plunge pool accessible from an oversized oceanfront balcony.

Penthouse Swim-Up Oceanfront King Suite

The Penthouse Swim-Up Oceanfront King Suite features a private master bedroom with a King-size bed and in-suite bathroom. The living area is furnished with a Murphy bed, sofa bed, 2 Smart TVs, 2 bathrooms and table with chairs. The balcony features a seating area with a table and couch, perfect for lazy days or stargazing at night. Guests can step directly into their ocean view infinity swim-up pool from their spacious balcony with sitting area.

Penthouse Swim-Up Oceanfront Queen Suite

The Penthouse Swim-Up Oceanfront Queen Suite features two Queen-size beds. The living area is furnished with a sofa bed, 2 Smart TVs, 2 bathrooms and table with chairs. The balcony features a seating area with a table and couch, perfect for lazy days or stargazing at night. Guests can step directly into their ocean view infinity plunge pool from their spacious balcony with sitting area.

Pineapple Suite

Inspired by SpongeBobâ€™s pineapple home under the sea, this sumptuous villa is the resortâ€™s signature dwelling. The modern amenities and luxurious accommodations come with a unique twist - all who enter are instantly immersed in SpongeBobâ€™s world

Swim-Up Oceanfront Connecting Suite

Connected to a Swim-Up Oceanfront Queen Suite, these swim-up suites are located on floors two to five and feature a private ocean-view infinity plunge pool from a furnished, oversized balcony.

Swim-Up Oceanfront King Suite

The Swim-Up Oceanfront King Suite features a private master bedroom with a King-size bed and in-suite bathroom. The living area is furnished with a Murphy bed, sofa bed, 2 Smart TVs, 2 bathrooms and table with chairs. The balcony features a seating area with a table and couch, perfect for lazy days or stargazing at night. Guests can step directly into their ocean view infinity swim-up pool from their spacious balcony with sitting area.

Swim-Up Oceanfront Pool Deck Level King Suite

The Swim-Up Oceanfront Pool Deck Level King Suite features a private master bedroom with a King-size bed and in-suite bathroom. The living area is furnished with a Murphy bed, sofa bed, 2 Smart TVs, two bathrooms and table with chairs. The balcony features a seating area with a table and couch, perfect for lazy days or stargazing at night. Guests have the convenience of direct access to the main pool right from their spacious balcony with sitting area.

Swim-Up Oceanfront Queen Suite

The Swim-Up Oceanfront Queen Suite features two Queen-size beds. The living area is furnished with a sofa bed, 2 Smart TVs, 2 bathrooms and table with chairs. The balcony features a seating area with a table and couch, perfect for lazy days or stargazing at night. Guests can step directly into their ocean view infinity plunge pool from their spacious balcony with sitting area.

Swim-Up Pool Deck Level Connecting Suite

Featuring a spacious primary bedroom with a king bed, an ensuite bathroom, living area, and oceanfront balcony, this suite is connected to a Swim-Up Oceanfront Pool Deck Level Queen Suite.

Make a Splash at Aqua NickÂ® Riviera Maya

Dive into Aqua NickÂ®, our sprawling Nickelodeon themed water park, home to six acres of adventure, exhilarating water slides, and lazy rivers â€” all surrounded by lush tropical gardens. Enjoy complimentary access to this epic aquatic attraction throughout your stay for endless fun-soaked memories.
